title: Undercover
description:
Tony Sam, Kiran Deol, and Brady Dale share stories about sobriety checks, undercover reporting, and misread signals.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Rolling Stones, Tony Sam, Kiran Deol, Tina Turner, Temper, Brady Dale, Hot Chocolate, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison)
